name: Rebuilding Rails
desc: This topic will help you work through Rebuilding Rails, and remind you to keep at it!

steps.name: Video Chapter 1: Zero to 'It Works'
steps.desc: Start by setting up your gem for the R00lz framework.

steps.name: Video Chapter 2: Controllers
steps.desc: Get your framework serving some requests! This is later in the same video as chapter 1.

steps.name: Video Chapter 3: Automatic Loading
steps.desc: For chapter 3 you'll need to log into Gumroad to see your purchased videos. Or skip these steps and switch to ebook! This chapter shows you how to do Rails-style automatic loading of classes.

steps.name: Video Chapter 4: Views
steps.desc: Learn how to use Erb to create your own Rails-style views.

steps.name: Video Chapter 5: Models
steps.desc: File models can be useful - RubyMadScience uses them! Learn how to write your own.

steps.name: Video Chapter 6: Request, Response
steps.desc: Your controllers get a lot more useful with Rack request and response objects.

steps.name: Video Chapter 7: ORMs
steps.desc: If you have the Rebuilding Rails Full package, walk through building your own Ruby ORM from scratch.

steps.name: Video Chapter 8: Middleware
steps.desc: This detachable chapter works at any point, and with basically any framework. Learn about Rack middleware.

steps.name: Video Extra Chapter: DSLs and Microframeworks
steps.desc: Learn how to build a Sinatra-like microframework, implemented as a Ruby DSL, in both top-level and modular flavours.
